title: User Registration and Login
description: Verify user can register with valid credentials and log in successfully with those credentials

steps.description: Navigate to registration page
Enter valid user information and submit registration
Verify registration completes with confirmation message
Navigate to login page
Enter valid credentials and submit login
Verify user is logged in and redirected to main dashboard

title: Login Failure with Invalid Credentials
description: Ensure login fails gracefully when incorrect username or password is entered

steps.description: Navigate to login page
Enter invalid username or password
Click login button
Verify error message indicating invalid credentials is displayed

title: Multi-Provider LLM Response Latency
description: Test that AI chat responses from OpenAI, Google Gemini, and Anthropic LLM providers stream first token in under 2 seconds

steps.description: Select each LLM provider in settings
Start a multi-turn conversation requesting AI response
Validate the first token of streaming response returns within 2 seconds

title: Long-Term Memory Injection and Retrieval Accuracy
description: Verify long-term semantic memory system indexes, retrieves, and injects relevant memories with configurable similarity threshold and supports pinned memories

steps.description: Create multiple manual memory entries and pin up to 5 entries
Start a conversation and trigger memory retrieval
Confirm top-K relevant memories are retrieved accurately based on similarity threshold
Verify pinned memories are always included in injection

title: RAG System Document Upload and Retrieval
description: Test multi-format document upload, chunking, embedding, hybrid retrieval, and citation generation with >=85% relevance accuracy

steps.description: Upload documents of type PDF, DOCX, CSV, Excel under 10MB
Verify document chunking completes successfully with multiple strategies
Perform semantic search queries on uploaded documents
Confirm retrieved chunks have at least 85% relevance accuracy
Validate citations are correctly generated and references appear in AI responses

title: Specialized AI Agent Creation and Usage
description: Verify user can create, edit, delete custom AI agents with system prompts and tool permissions, and use them in conversations

steps.description: Navigate to agent management interface
Create a new custom agent with specified system prompts and tool permissions
Confirm the new agent is saved and appears in agent list
Edit the custom agent to update prompts and permissions
Verify changes are saved successfully
Delete the custom agent and confirm it is removed
Start a conversation selecting a predefined and custom agent
Verify agent responses use updated prompts and permissions

title: Image Upload, Generation, and Vision AI Capabilities
description: Test multiple simultaneous image uploads, clipboard paste, AI generation using DALL-E 3 and Stability AI, and vision model integration

steps.description: Upload multiple images simultaneously using UI
Validate images are uploaded, stored correctly, and thumbnails generated
Paste images from clipboard into input fields
Verify pasted images appear correctly in conversation
Request AI image generation via DALL-E 3 and Stability AI
Confirm generated images render properly and are stored
Use vision AI models to analyze uploaded images
Check vision AI outputs are accurate and contextually relevant

title: External Tools Integration and Failure Handling
description: Validate functionality and fallback handling of integrated tools: Tavily web search, web scraping, YouTube summarization, data analysis, diagram generation

steps.description: Perform web search queries via Tavily
Verify accurate web search results and image previews are displayed
Run web scraping tasks using multiple scraping methods
Ensure scraped content is extracted and formatted correctly
Summarize YouTube video transcripts and metadata
Confirm summaries are coherent and reflect video contents
Conduct data analysis on uploaded CSV or Excel files
Validate correct generation of charts and visualizations
Generate diagrams via Kroki integration specifying various formats
Check diagrams render accurately according to input
Simulate API failures for external tools
Verify system displays graceful fallback messages without crashing

title: Conversation Summarization and Suggestions
description: Ensure summarization and suggestion features generate contextually relevant outputs with user acceptability over 80%

steps.description: Conduct multi-turn conversations with diverse topics
Trigger conversation summarization and suggestion generation
Verify summaries and suggestions accurately reflect conversation context
In user testing, check acceptability rating is >=80%

title: File Upload and Processing Performance
description: Test file upload, preview, processing, and RAG integration for supported file formats with processing times under 30 seconds for files <10MB

steps.description: Upload supported file types including PDF, DOCX, CSV, Excel, images under 10MB
Verify file preview and metadata display correctly
Ensure processing pipeline completes within 30 seconds
Confirm processed data is integrated into RAG for semantic search

title: Security and Data Privacy Enforcement
description: Test authentication, authorization, data privacy, and protection against common web vulnerabilities

steps.description: Attempt unauthorized access to protected resources
Verify access is denied and proper error messages are presented
Test password handling and storage for registration and login
Confirm passwords are hashed with bcrypt and never stored in plaintext
Conduct penetration tests targeting common web vulnerabilities (XSS, CSRF, SQL injection)
Ensure no security vulnerabilities are exploitable
Check sensitive data leakages in logs, UI, and API responses
Verify no sensitive data is exposed and encryption is enforced where necessary

title: User Interface Responsiveness and Accessibility
description: Validate UI responsiveness across devices, WCAG 2.1 AA accessibility compliance, dark/light mode support, and clear user feedback

steps.description: Access the platform from multiple devices and screen sizes
Verify the UI is responsive and adapts without layout issues
Evaluate UI using accessibility tools to check WCAG 2.1 AA compliance
Confirm accessibility criteria are met including keyboard navigation and screen reader support
Switch between dark and light modes
Verify color schemes change appropriately and all text remains readable
Trigger various error conditions in forms and interactions
Check error messages and feedback are clear and informative

title: API Key Management Security and Functionality
description: Ensure secure storage, retrieval, and management of user API keys with encryption and access control

steps.description: Add API keys for OpenAI, Gemini, Tavily, and other services via UI
Verify keys are encrypted in storage and not visible in plain text in UI or database
Attempt to retrieve or modify API keys without proper authorization
Ensure access is denied

title: Conversation Export Functionality
description: Test export of conversations in Markdown, HTML, and JSON formats with correct timestamps and metadata

steps.description: Open a conversation and request export in Markdown format
Confirm exported file contains correct conversation text, timestamps, and metadata
Repeat export process for HTML and JSON formats
Verify data integrity and formatting correctness in all exported files
